document.full_text: the los angeles kings earned a small amount of breathing space in the jam-packed western conference playoff race with a nail-biting 2-1 shootout victory over the calgary flames on monday.
document.title: kings castle flames in nhl shootout to tighten playoffs grip
lines_and_colors: the los angeles kings earned a small amount of breathing space in the jam-packed western conference playoff race with a nail-biting 2-1 shootout victory over the calgary flames on monday.
